ARTICLE.TITLE: Maine Mendoza reveals her dream collabs: Ben&Ben, Juan Karlos and more
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Maine Mendoza

We all know Maine Mendoza is a phenomenal actress, television host and all-around fun gal. Now she's also a recording artist with a new single "Parang Kailan Lang" coming out this March!

Since Maine's new song was a collaboration with electro-pop band Gracenote, GMA News Online caught up with her on the set of the official music video and asked who else she wants to work with in the future.

SNEAK PEEK: Maine Mendoza is shooting a music video for her new single "Parang Kailan Lang." It's expected to be released on March 20, but it was already the #1 pre-ordered item on iTunes Philippines this week. @universalrecph @gmanews pic.twitter.com/voB1OvN21P — Margaret Claire Layug (@MClaireLayug) February 28, 2020

Her first mention was none other than the indie-folk pop band Ben&Ben. Maine said working with them will be a "dream come true" for her.

"Ang gaganda rin ng mga songs nila, ang ganda ng message, the way they write it, ang ganda ng meaning nung songs."

Another name she mentioned is Juan Karlos, whose music she also admires.

"So far, sila palang ang mga naiisip ko," Maine said. "Pero kahit sino naman, syempre I would be glad to accept the offer the collaboration!"

But for now, Maine is super excited for her fans to hear her new single, which she says is "about a girl who reminisces her past with someone."

"Parang Kailan Lang" is set to be released on March 20, but you can now pre-order the song on iTunes. —MGP, GMA News

This article Maine Mendoza reveals her dream collabs: Ben&Ben, Juan Karlos and more was originally published in GMA News Online.
